473:1: asmin khalu punastathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto'bhūt|
473:2: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-asmin khalu punarajita tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśadharmaparyāye nirdiśyamāne aṣṭaṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntirutpannā|
473:3: ebhyaḥ sahasraguṇena yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dhāraṇīpratilambho'bhūt|
473:4: anyeṣāṃ ca sāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā asaṅgapratibhānatāpratilambho'bhūt|
473:5: anyeṣāṃ ca dvisāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīnayutaśatasahasraparivartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho'bhūt|
473:6: anye ca trisāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avaivartyadharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ|
473:7: anye ca madhyamakalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vimalanirbhāsacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ|
473:8: anye ca kṣudrakalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā aṣṭajāti[prati]baddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
473:9: anye ca catuścāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā caturjātipratibaddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
473:10: anye ca tricāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā trijātipratibaddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
473:11: anye ca dvicāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā dvijātipratibaddhā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
473:12: anye caikacāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā ekajātipratibaddhā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
473:13: aṣṭatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni||
473:14: atha samanantaranirdiṣṭe bhagavataiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmābhisamaye pratiṣṭhāne,
473:16: teṣu ca lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni tāni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāgatya ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāni,
473:20: bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭamavakiranti sma,
473:23: taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣado'vakiranti sma,
473:29: hārārdhahāramuktāhāramaṇiratnamahāratnāni copariṣṭādvaihāyasamantarīkṣe samantāt savāsu dikṣu pralambanti sma|
473:30: samantācca anarghaprāptasya dhūpasya ghaṭikāsahasrāṇi ratnamayāni svayameva pravicaranti sma|
473:31: ekaikasya ca tathāgatasya ratnamayīṃ chatrāvalīṃ yāvad brahmalokādupari vaihāyasamantarīkṣe bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhārayāmāsuḥ|
473:32: anena paryāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ teṣāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ratnamayīṃ chatrāvalīṃ yāvadbrahmalokādupari vaihāyasamantarīkṣe dhārayāmāsuḥ|
473:34: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
473:99: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-yairajita asmiṃstathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśadharmaparyāye nirdiśyamāne sattvairekacittotpādikāpyadhimuktirutpāditā,
473:101: kiyatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasavantīti tacchṛṇu,
473:102: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru|
473:104: tadyathāpi nāma ajitakaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pañcasu pāramitāsvaṣṭau kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi caret|
473:105: tadyathā dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ virahitaḥ prajñāpāramitayā,
473:106: yena ca ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā ekacittotpādikāpyadhimuktirutpāditā abhiśraddadhānatā vā kṛtā,
473:107: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalābhisaṃskārasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ kuśalābhisaṃskāraḥ pañcapāramitāpratisaṃyukto'ṣṭakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrapariniṣpannaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti,
473:108: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīnayutasahasratamīmapi koṭīnayutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti,
473:109: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamate|
473:110: evaṃrūpeṇa ajita puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vivartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate||
473:111: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata-
473:115: dānaṃ dadanto buddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ||18||
473:131: styānamiddhaṃ ca varjitvā kalpakoṭyo hi yaścaret||26||
473:134: tena dhyānena so vīraḥ prārthayed bodhimuttamām|
473:136: yacca puṇyaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ niṣevitvā imāṃ kriyām|
473:138: āyuṃ ca mama yo śrutvā strī vāpi puruṣo'pi vā|
473:140: vicikitsāṃ ca varjitvā iñjitā manyitāni ca|
473:143: na te trasanti śrutvedaṃ mama āyuracintiyam||32||
473:151: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ vijānanti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate||36||
473:152: punaraparamajita ya imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avataredadhimucyeta avagāheta avabudhyeta,
473:154: kaḥ punarvādo ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāvayeta vācayeda dhārayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā pustakagataṃ vā satkuryāt,
473:157: yadā ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāya śrutvā adhyāśayenādhimucyate,
473:158: tadā tasyedamadhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam-yaduta gṛdhrakūṭaparvatagataṃ māṃ dharmaṃ nirdeśayantaṃ drakṣyati bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ śrāvakasaṃghamadhyagatam|
473:159: idaṃ ca me buddhakṣetraṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryamayīṃ samaprastarāṃ drakṣyati suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadavinaddhāṃ ratnavṛkṣairvicitritām|
473:160: kūṭāgāraparibhogeṣu ca atra bodhisattvān nivasato drakṣyati|
473:161: idamajita adhyāśayenādhimuktasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā adhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam||
473:162: api tu khalu punarajita tānapyahamadhyāśayādhimuktān kulaputrān vadāmi,
473:163: ye tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pratikṣepsyanti uttari cābhyanumodayiṣyanti|
473:165: tatastathāgataṃ soṃ'sena pariharati ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati|
473:166: na me tenājita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā stūpāḥ kartavyāḥ,
473:170: kṛtā me tena ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śarīreṣu śarīrapūjā,
473:172: yāvad brahmalokamuccaistvena anupūrvapariṇāhena sacchatraparigrahāḥ savaijayantīkā ghaṇṭāsamudgānuratāḥ,
473:173: teṣāṃ ca śarīrastūpānāṃ vividhāḥ satkārāḥ kṛtā nānāvidhairdivyairmānuṣyakaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhirvividhama-dhuramanojñapaṭupaṭahadundubhimahādundubhibhirvādyatālaninādarnirghoṣaśabdairnānāvidhaiśca gītanṛtyalāsyaprakārairbahubhiraparimitairbahvaprameyāṇi kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi satkāraḥ kṛto bhavati|
473:174: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ mama parinirvṛtasya dhārayitvā vācayitvā likhitvā prakāśayitvā vihārā api tena ajita kṛtā bhavanti vipulā vistīrṇāḥ|
473:177: te ca bahvaprameyā yaduta śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā koṭī vā koṭīśataṃ vā koṭīsahasraṃ vā koṭiśatasahasraṃ vā koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ vā|
473:178: te ca mama saṃmukhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ,
473:180: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā lekhayedvā,
473:181: tadanenāhamajitaparyāyeṇa evaṃ vadāmi-na me tena parinirvṛtasya dhātustūpāḥ kārayitavyāḥ,
473:183: kaḥ punarvādo'jita ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayan dānena vā saṃpādayecchīlena vā kṣāntyā vā vīryeṇa vā dhyānena vā prajñayā vā saṃpādayet,
473:184: bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparyantam|
473:185: tadyathāpi nāma ajita ākāśa dhāturaparyantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu dikṣu vidikṣu,
473:186: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyābhisaṃskārān prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyān ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā|
473:200: yasya kasyacidajita bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayataḥ ime evaṃrūpā guṇā bhaveyurye mayā parikīrtitāḥ,
473:201: so'jita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ veditavyaḥ-bodhimaṇḍasaṃprasthito'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlaṃ gacchati|
473:202: yatra ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tiṣṭhedvā niṣīdedvā caṃkramedvā,
473:204: tathāgatastūpo'yamiti ca sa vaktavyaḥ sadevakena lokeneti||
473:205: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
473:206: puṇyaskandho aparyanto varṇito me punaḥ punaḥ|
473:215: kṛtā vādyaiśca vastraiśca dundubhībhiḥ punaḥ puna||41||
473:216: madhurā vādyabhāṇḍā ca vāditā teṣu dhātuṣu|
473:218: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāli ca deśayet|
473:219: īdṛśī me kṛtā tena vividhā pūjanantikā||43||
473:226: saṃghasya vividhā pūjā kṛtā me tena saṃmukham|
473:228: adhimuktisāro yo syādato bahutaraṃ hi saḥ|
473:229: puṇyaṃ labheta yo etatsūtraṃ vācellikheta vā||48||
473:232: dīpaṃ ca dadyādyo nityaṃ gandhatailasya pūritam|
473:234: kuryādetādṛśīṃ pūjāṃ pustakeṣu ca yo naraḥ|
473:235: bahu prasavate puṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya no bhavet||51||
473:238: kaḥ punarvādo yaśca syāt kṣānto dāntaḥ samāhitaḥ|
473:241: bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇato nityaṃ nādhimānī na cālasaḥ||54||
473:242: prajñavāṃścaiva dhīraśca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na kupyati|
473:243: anulomaṃ ca deśeti kṛpābuddhī ca prāṇiṣu||55||
473:244: ya īdṛśo bhavetkaścid yaḥ sūtraṃ dhārayedidam|
473:252: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ cintayi tasmi kāle
473:268: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye puṇyaparyāyaparivarto nāma ṣoḍaśamaḥ||
